articles.title: George Clooney Responds to Tom Cruise Covid-19 Speech: ‘He Didn’t Overreact’ - IndieWire
articles.description: "It’s just not my style to take everybody to task that way," Clooney told Howard Stern of Cruise's on-set outburst.
